metadata.synopsis: A small group discuss the next step of the local Rivingtonian militia concerning the "Refugee issue". There are too many outsiders in Rivington walking the street without "escort" to their taste. This is human civilian 01's one-liner.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - go to 2;50;-18.- Dialogue should when talking to the human civilian 1 in front of the well.

0.speaker: Gethin
0.text: This is our city - remember that.

1.speaker: Gethin
1.text: Any of the refugees give you hassle, come to us - we know how to handle them.
1.context: NodeContext: friendly - thinks player is one of them

2.speaker: Gethin
2.text: Great - another bloody outsider. You lot are coming out of the walls, aren't you?

3.speaker: Gethin
3.text: If it were up to me, I'd kick every outsider out on their arse, then slam the gates shut. City has gone to the dogs.
3.context: NodeContext: friendly - thinks player is one of them
